name: 李有豐
objective:
The objective of this course is to introduce the basic concepts of the mechanical behavior of FRP composite materials as well as their applications in Civil engineering.The main contents are 
1. Introduction to FRP composite materials
2. Mechanics of composite materials
3. Engineering applications of FRP composite materials
schedule:
1. Introduction to FRP composite materials  and mechanics of composite materials, 1~2 week
2. Mechanics of composite materials, 3~5 week
3. Engineering applications of FRP composite materials, 6~16 week
4. Final report presentation 17~18 week
scorePolicy:
1. Study research articles and presentation 60%
2. Final report 40%
materials:
1. Composites for Construction_Structural Design with FRP Materials

References:
1. 李有豐，FRP 複合材料於土木與建築工程之應用，臺灣區複合材料工業同業公會，民國 101 年 11 月。
2. 期刊論文
